author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Suzhou TFC Optical Communication says dividend payment date on April 24
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Suzhou TFC Optical Communication Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 3.2 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 23
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 24 and the dividend will be paid on April 24
